text: @CBSNews @NYGovCuomo put 1,000 of elderly COVID-19 patients into nursing homes where well patients lived and YOU want to blame Trump?? I hope every family of a deceased patient sues the living crap out of him!! #DemocratsAreDomesticTerrorists  #Trump2020LandslideReElectionVictory
